If you are referring to the embedded runner:
  Right Click > Copy trace
  Paste into another editor.

It may not be the runner cropping it though.

=jason

On Thu, 2003-06-12 at 11:13, javainsel wrote:
> If the line of a failure trace is too witdth then in the JUnit view 
> the line
> is cropped which means that I cannot read the whole line.
> 
> What solution is there for this problem?
> 
> I use Eclipse 2.0.2.
